transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji Vishnu ji good afternoon Preeti Rathore baat kar rahi hu kaise ho aap India Mart head office se baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Haan theek ho theek ho boliye.
Executive: Accha actually maine call kiya tha sir aapne customer care se call kiya tha abhi 9696 pe kuch concern tha?
Customer: Haan ek spam hua hai uske spam hua hai uske liye phone kiya tha India Mart ka customer hai.
Executive: Buyer ke sath se?
Customer: Buyer hai.
Executive: Accha kya scam hua hai?
Customer: Wo aise hua hai wo bolta hai wo Jharkhand government ka employee hai theek hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To PhD department ka hai.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Tab usme LED ka order hai.
Customer: To order value jo quotation humne diya tha.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Quotation ke hisab se order value banaya banane ke baad bola ki aapko ek registration karna padega Jharkhand government ke sath.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To to uske liye aapko ek registration charge dena padega theek hai wo amount nominal amount is 17500.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: To same cheez maine dusra ko bhi bola hu to uske pass bhi same aaya hai wo bhi India Mart ka hi seller hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm theek hai.
Customer: To bola ki ha mere sath ye bhi ho gaya hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To uske regarding usko dalna hai.
Executive: Accha aap mujhe na uski detail de dijiye sir ek bar aapke pass me I think mera number already added hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Main aapko hi likh deti hu aur jo bhi details hai aap mujhe ek bar bhej dijiye main ek bar yahan se na check kara leti hu hamara jo legal team hai unke sath me bhej sakte hu.
Customer: Haan theek hai.
Executive: To aap mujhe sari detail bhej dijiye jo bhi hai number hai aur kya requirement dali thi.
Customer: Aur kya kya bola hai agar koi jaise chat hai conversation hai wo sara bhej dijiye to main unko bhej deti hu wo apne end se validate karke blacklist kar denge usko.
Executive: Theek theek.
Executive: Theek hai and be aware koi bhi aisa kuch aata hai ki main government yahan se hu army se hu wo sab na fraud hi hote hain kyuki open platform hai to anyone can lead to India Mart directly kyuki ye bahut bada platform hai hai na to aapko hi aware hona hoga us case me ki kahin pe koi link pe koi click na kare koi ya kuch bhi hmm.
Customer: Yaar wo bol ke hi na main khud kar raha hu scam ke liye.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Haan main isliye bol rahi hu ki matlab wo kahin na kahin unka scam hai but waha pe matlab har aadmi ko aaj ki date me matlab self aware hai hi mere pass me koi aisa link aata hai to main click hi nahi karti hu koi call aati hai to main usko jyada respond hi nahi karti hu matlab I disconnect the call in 10 to 15 seconds only to wo bas aapko thoda aware rehna hai aur aisa aap mujhe detail de dijiye taki main immediately usko blacklist kara du.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai already ye number se already bahut sara aadmi ke sath kar liya hai lekin koi complaint nahi kiya main jitna market me khabar lagaya.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: To nominal amount kisi se 1250 liya kisi se 2000 liya kisi se 1550 liya aise karke le raha hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm ha main wahi bol rahi hu market me kabhi kuch naya chalta hai kabhi kuch beech me chalta tha ki ha wo army se hai wo requirement hai army me kuch aisa allowed nahi hota they have their own platforms apne order place karne ke liye they have their own vendors.
Customer: Koi government me aise nahi hota ki aapko 15 20 lakh ka order aise bato me muh me hi de dega to tendering ke bina hoga kaise.
Executive: Correct wo tenders hi unke nikalte hain wo tenders se hi unka kam hota hai koi bhi ek separate aadmi bina tender kaise kar hi nahi sakta they run with the norms and everything matlab I think itna bhi tak allowed nahi hota ki agar koi aadmi me hai to wo apna lakh tak hi allow hai uske baad wo to hai hum log to government me kam karte hai.
Executive: Haan haan haan wo jisko idea hai wo hai jisko nahi hai wo bechara matlab fas jata hai waha pe mang leta hai karke lekin wahi pe wahi hai ki aise self awareness hi jaruri hai ki bhai OTP ya link kisi bhi link pe aapko click nahi karna hai agar aap kar rahe ho koi OTP mang raha hai aap de do to wo problem hai hi matlab aise suspected wale me to nahi jana hai jahan pe aapko aap validate kar lete ho IDs hai documents hai waha theek hai chalo ho jati hai but har jagah pe nahi ho pati to koi bhi buyer is tarike se aapko bolta hai to wo thoda sa aapki awareness ke liye bhi hai kyuki alag alag naye form me kuch na kuch aata hi hai to wo thoda smartly baat karni padti hai.
Executive: To jo details hai aap mujhe ek bar wo bhej dena aur main unko blacklist kara deti hu right away theek hai aap mujhe whatsapp pe sari details dal dijiyega unki kya requirement dali thi kis number se dali thi taki wo team aage.
Customer: Screenshot hi de deta hu screenshot hi de deta hu.
Executive: Haan haan haan theek hai aap bhej dijiye baki concern fir main close karungi kuch hoga to mujhe whatsapp pe aap bata dena theek hai.
Customer: Okay okay okay theek hai Vishnu ji all right thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer faced a scam attempt via IndiaMART.

- Scammer posed as a Jharkhand government employee.

- Scammer asked for registration fee of ₹17,500.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to blacklist the scammer.

- Executive shared awareness tips to avoid scams.

- Customer agreed to share details via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to send details via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- scam, fraud, blacklist, awareness, registration fee
